meanings.sent1: The cake was multilayered with different flavors in each layer.
meanings.sent2: The painting had a multilayered effect with various colors blending together.
meanings.sent3: The multilayered sandwich was so tall that it almost touched the ceiling!
meanings.sent4: Her multilayered personality revealed new depths every time you spoke to her.
meanings.sent5: The forest was a multilayered ecosystem, with plants, animals, and insects interacting in harmony.

meanings.definition: Having multiple layers of complexity or depth.
meanings.sent1: The novel was multilayered, with hidden meanings waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent2: The movie had a multilayered plot that kept the audience engaged till the end.
meanings.sent3: The multilayered puzzle seemed easy at first, but it turned out to be quite challenging.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts were as multilayered as an onion, revealing different aspects with each layer.
meanings.sent5: The multilayered emotions in his eyes told a story of pain, joy, and longing.
